attributes.action: Stop the use of drugs with side effects.
attributes.additional_details: I would the government to stop schizophrenia which is a fake illness from ever reoccuring in the adult population. I would like them to cut funding to privatised drug companies which make money off of the suffering of the poorly and regularly hurt them by giving them side effects for illnesses they never would have had.

rejection.details: The Government does not diagnose or define illnesses, nor does it directly fund drug companies.
